mapper.insert: insert into todo_mst values( 0, #{todo_content}, 0, #{importance_flag}, now(), now() )
mapper.select:
select tm.todo_code,
tm.todo_content, tm.todo_complete, tm.importance_flag,
tt.total_count, tc.incomplete_count,
tm.create_date, tm.update_date
from todo_mst tm LEFT OUTER JOIN (select COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM todo_mst where
importance_flag = 1
todo_complete = 1
todo_complete = 0
1 = 1
) tt ON (1 = 1) LEFT OUTER JOIN (select COUNT(todo_complete) AS incomplete_count from todo_mst where todo_complete = 0
and importance_flag = 1
) tc ON (1 = 1) where
importance_flag = 1
todo_complete = 1
todo_complete = 0
1 = 1
order by todo_code desc limit #{index}, #{count}
mapper.update: UPDATE todo_mst SET todo_complete = CASE WHEN todo_complete = '0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHERE todo_code = #{todo_code};
UPDATE todo_mst SET importance_flag = CASE WHEN importance_flag = '0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHERE todo_code = #{todo_code};

update todo_mst set todo_content = #{todo_content},
update_date = now() where todo_code = #{todo_code}
